page.title: 17Making Music
page.content: One of my interests is playing the cornet in the Lydney Town Band. My position is 2nd. or 3rd. cornet. I also take part in open competitions and have won top places in some and also had commendations. I have made lots of friends through music. At school I am learning to play the flute. My teacher is called Miss Tate but after the holidays she will be Mrs. Young. I am hoping to join the local youth orchetra soon. My favourite piece of music is "Sheep May Safely Graze" by J.S. Bach. My instrument is the piano. I am having lessons privately with a local teacher called Mrs. Mills. I have been learning for two years and I have just taken my Grade 1 exam. At school 11 play the violin, 2 a cello, 6 a flute, 6 a clarinet, one a trombone,2 a cornet and 7 the piano.
